author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mabion To Get 63.3 Mln Zloty Subsidy For R&D Centre Enlargement
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - MABION SA:
* SAID ON WEDNESDAY THAT ITS PROJECT REGARDING ENLARGEMENT OF THE COMPANYâ€™S R&D CENTRE HAS BEEN CHOSEN FOR FINANCING
* THE PROJECT TO BE FINANCED IN THE AMOUNT OF 63.3 MILLION ZLOTYS, THE TOTAL COST OF PROJECT AT 172.9 MILLION ZLOTYS
